snippet: The Defense Ministry ordered troops in the southern region on full combat readiness, a move that appeared intended to unnerve neighbors.
abstract: Russia alarms neighbors by conducting full military readiness exercise on its southern border; move comes ahead of talks between European powers aimed at resolving tensions with Ukraine and after Obama administration announced buildup of NATO defenses in Central and Eastern Europe.
lead_paragraph: The Defense Ministry ordered troops in the southern region on full combat readiness, a move that appeared intended to unnerve neighbors.

headline.main: Russia Announces Surprise Military Drills in South
headline.print_headline: Russia Surprises Its Southern Neighbors With Military Exercises
